title: #239: Profiling Bill Cosby, Part 4
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue to deconstruct Bill Cosby’s behaviour with award winning investigative journalist and author host of the podcast Chasing Cosby, Nicki Weisensee Egan.


We discuss why many of the Cosby cases were not prosecuted, the statute of limitations and the amazing women fighting for law reform to protect others. 



#VictimsMatter

#ChasingCosby
